name: My Dragon From Hell
description:
You've just brought home a brand new pet dragon... but it has some behavior problems that leave your backyard in shambles!  Using positive reinforcement, patience and consistency, train your pet to be a well-mannered companion!

Built on live machine learning, your actions impact your dragon's behavior over time. No two dragons will be trained quite the same way! Love to see things burn? Make sure to reward it! Want a calm, cozy pet? Encourage that demeanor!

AI Engineer & Programmer: James Fiacco

Animation: Jacqueline Yee

Art: Gwen Bassett

Design: Liz Fiacco

Made for the the GMTK Jam 2020!
